solution_line_template: In her {num_albums_1} albums, Beyonce releases {num_albums_1} * {songs_per_album_1} = <<{num_albums_1}*{songs_per_album_1}={songs_from_albums_1}>>{songs_from_albums_1} songs
In her next album, Beyonce releases {num_albums_2} * {songs_per_album_2} = <<{num_albums_2}*{songs_per_album_2}={songs_from_albums_2}>>{songs_from_albums_2} songs

Since each single is one song, Beyonce releases a total of {songs_from_albums_1} + {songs_from_albums_2} + {num_singles} = <<{songs_from_albums_1}+{songs_from_albums_2}+{num_singles}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs
